vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Exchange Server Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Microsoft Exchange Server contains a vulnerability that allows remote code execution when PowerShell is accessible to the attacker.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply security update per vendor instructions

vulnerabilities.vulnerabilityName: Apache Log4j Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.shortDescription: Apache Log4j contains a remote code execution vulnerability due to insufficient input validation in JNDI lookups.
Microsoft Exchange Server contains a server-side request forgery vulnerability that allows remote code execution.
vulnerabilities.requiredAction: Apply security update per vendor instructions
